entries.name: Druidcraft
entries.properties:
Produce some small harmless nature phenomenon such as:
  • Predict the whether within 24 hours.
  • Make a flower instantly grow and blossom.
  • Have a gentle wind rustle the leaves of a tree or brush against a creature.
  • Create a natural smell or sound.
  • Have a nearby song bird come rest on caster's shoulder for a few seconds.
  • Have a canopy of leaves open to shine light on an area or close around to overshadow an area.

entries.name: Thaumaturgy
entries.properties:
Produce some small harmless phenomenon such as:
  • Voice becomes deeper, echos, and is much louder.
  • Cause fire to flicker, crack, or become twice as big.
  • Alter appearance of eyes to glow, burn with fire, become pitch black or pale white.
  • Cause the immediate area around you to become slightly darker.

entries.name: Mending
entries.properties: Repair a cracked, broken, or torn nonmagical object.

entries.name: Animal friendship
entries.saving throw: WIS 11 ST: spell has no effect.
entries.properties:
Target animal of <= 0 INF is convinced that caster mean it and its allies no harm.
If caster or any of his allies harms the target, the spell ends.
An animal cannot be targeted by this spell more than once each day.

entries.name: Charm human
entries.saving throw: WIS 12 ST: spell has no effect.
entries.properties:
Charm a non-ally human or intelligent creature.
Once the charm ends, the human knows it's been charmed.
A human cannot be targeted by this spell more than once each day.

entries.name: Detect magic
entries.properties:
Sense the location of spells, magical traps, or magic users (specially: not magical items) within radius.
Can sense through one layer of 2 ft thick wall, ceiling, or floor.

entries.name: Entangling roots
entries.properties: All targets in area are snared. Can unsnare early with a 12 STR check. If a target ends turn in snare area, they are snared.
entries.hidden properties: [ARCANA 14] Can be canceled with fire DMG AoE in same area.
entries.description: Strong roots spring from the ground wrapping around all in the area.

entries.name: Fog cloud
entries.properties: Any creature within the cloud is blinded. Any attack against a concealed creature within the cloud has disadvantage and -5 to AR.
entries.description: A thick cloud of fog slowly rises from the ground.

entries.name: Heal (cure wounds)
entries.properties:
Target regains 4+(1/2 INF) HP.
Target must be a living creature.

entries.name: Grease
entries.saving throw: DEX 12 ST: does not fall prone.
entries.properties:
Any creature that moves on or into the grease area falls prone.
If the grease is cast into water, it instead creates a 10 foot sphere that blinds anything in the cloud.
entries.description: A thick black oil bubble forms from the ground and bursts into a greasy puddle.

entries.name: Jump
entries.properties:
Target's jump distance is tripled.
Creature cannot be target of spell more than once each hour.

entries.name: Thunderwave
entries.components: Must shout: "THUNDERWAVE!" in a deep booming voice.
entries.saving throw: DEX 14 ST: half DMG and target not pushed away.
entries.properties: Causes all objects weighing < 200 lbs to be flung away 15 feet.
entries.description: A force wave shoots from the caster's palms.

entries.name: Web
entries.properties:
Any creature in the webbing is snared.
Webbing has 15 HP and can be attacked with acid, fire, force, or slashing DMG; it is immune to all other damage types.
May be burst with a STR 15 check - missing HP of webbing: can move out of webbing.
entries.description: A thick sticky webbing trap shoots from a gland, springing into a web netting.

entries.name: Beast sense
entries.properties:
Touch a willing animal.
Caster see, hear, and sense what the animal sees, hears, and senses while ignoring caster's own senses.

entries.name: Blink
entries.saving throw: INF 12-17 ST (DM decides): Safely teleport to unseen space. If < 5 below ST: teleports anywhere 10 ft away from desired space.  If >= 5 below ST: teleport anywhere 25 ft away from desired space.
entries.properties:
Teleport with all equipment to an unoccupied space that can be seen.
Teleporting into the unseen requires a ST.
entries.description: Quickly shifts from one space to another.

entries.name: Cleanse (Cure wounds)
entries.properties: End a temporary disease or temporary condition afflicting the target.

entries.name: Gust of wind
entries.properties:
Causes all objects and creatures weighing < 500 lbs to be pushed 15 feet away from caster. Does not block ranged attacks.
Creature being pushed can make a 12 STR check to move forward 10 ft.
Caster can use an action point to rotate the beam 15 degrees.
entries.description: A great current of wind shoots continually from the caster.

entries.name: Liquid body
entries.properties: Can squeeze through a 1 in hole with all equipment. If concentration is broken during spell, the body becomes rigid except any part being squeezed, which becomes rigid after 1 hour; perhaps causing the loss of a limb.
entries.description: A body part concentrated on and pressed against a small opening becomes elastic and like thick liquid squeezes into the opening. When able, the body part reconstitutes into its normal form.

entries.name: Locate animal or plant
entries.properties:
Locates the direction and distance to the closest specified animal or plant within 5 miles.
Can concentrate on spell until target is located.
Once located, the spell ends.
Can only be cast once per day.

entries.name: Radiant beam (Moonbeam)
entries.properties:
Cannot be cast indoors or underground.
All within the cylinder or looking towards it when fired are blinded for 1 turn.
entries.description: The power of the moon and sun calls down a beam of pure energy.

entries.name: Spike growth
entries.properties:
Damage is dealt for each 5 ft an enemy moves through the area.
A perception check of 14 is needed to detect the affected area if it hasn't been walked over yet.

entries.name: Dispel magic
entries.properties:
+3 * (level of spell) magic resist on target, even if target is friendly the spell must succeed against the target's magic resist.
On hit, any magic on the target is removed; any magic being performed by the target is canceled.
A magic cannot be targeted by this spell more than once each day.
entries.description: Magic is forced out of an area around the target.

entries.name: Lightning storm (Call lightning)
entries.properties:
If cast indoors, room floor must be at least 1000 sq ft with a 15 ft tall ceiling.
Every turn the spell continues, it costs an additional 3 mana.
It takes 1 turn to fill the area with a storm cloud. Every turn after that, the caster chooses a target within the area, striking them with lightning.
When the caster has < 3 mana, the spell ends. The caster may also cancel the spell early.
If there is naturally a storm, the caster can call down lightning on the first turn.
entries.description: A storm cloud quickly forms above the caster as the caster calls down streaks of lightning.

entries.name: Memories of plants (Speak with plants)
entries.properties:
Caster peers into the recent memories of the touched plant. The caster makes INF checks to see how long and what information he gains during his meditation. Plant memories are up to the DM, but they should be difficult to follow, much like a fleeting vision.
Caster cannot use this spell again for 30 minutes.
entries.description: Caster goes into a trance as strange flashing memories fill his mind.

entries.name: Plant growth
entries.properties:
Caster can shape the effected area as desired.
All plant life in an already plant covered area becomes overgrown, making the ground difficult terrain.
All plant life in a plant sparse area begins to grow into a fertile plot.
The soil is enriched for the duration, and concentration is not needed after the ritual is completed.
entries.description: Plant life quickly grows or overgrows, enriched with magical energy.

entries.name: Thunderburst
entries.saving throw: DEX 16 ST: half DMG and target not pushed away.
entries.properties: Causes all objects weighing < 400 lbs to be flung outward 15 feet.
entries.description: With a snap of a finger and a targeted stare, a sudden pulse of great energy bursts from a point to a sphere of wind; dissipating in an instant.

entries.name: Water walk
entries.properties:
Spell grants the ability to move across any liquid surface as if it were normal terrain.
If the liquid is harmful, the feet will be inflicted with DMG determined by the DM.
The caster may hold onto targets, allowing them to water walk with him.
If the caster is submerged in liquid, it will draw him to the surface 60 ft per turn.
entries.description: Casters feet emit an aura that resonates when touching liquid.

entries.name: Control water
entries.properties:
Caster bends the flow of water in area as he pleases. The water can move at a rate that by itself would cause no harm to typical creatures.
The caster may move the area 10 ft per turn.
As some limitations and examples:
  • May create a vortex or hole in the water 60 ft deep.
  • May pull water straight up 20 ft, if sufficient enough water.
  • May avert the flow of a 10 ft long river.
  • May cause a 10 ft wave to wash over an area.
entries.description: Casters focuses intently on an area of water, which bends willingly in his favor.

entries.name: Phase
entries.properties: Phase out of the material and into the ethereal plane.  Can remain in ethereal plane for 2 turns or leave early without any cost.
entries.description: Body briefly becomes ghostlike then shifts into the ethereal plane.

entries.name: Push
entries.properties:
Causes all objects weighing < 500 lbs to be pushed 15 feet away for as long as caster keeps concentration. Does not block ranged attacks.
Creature being pushed can make a 13 STR check to move forward 5 ft.
entries.description: A force pulse continually spans from the casting source.
